    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String dataFilePath,
          java.lang.String recordToDelete)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes a record from a data file
        Parameters:
        dataFilePath - The file path of the data file
        recordToDelete - The record in the file to delete. If there are duplicate records (there shouldn't be), only the first record will be deleted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Possibly thrown when getFileContents or writeStringToFile are called
